channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1178; 05:50PM; 15707 W Roxford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3mnaqhi; Sylmar; KNOCKDOWN: 18 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. They contained the fire to the detached garage with neither the single family dwelling to the front or the unit to the rear sustaining damage. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E75 E91 RA91 T75; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1178; 05:33PM; 15707 W Roxford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3mnaqhi; Sylmar; One story, detached garage well involved in fire. Firefighters are defending the single family dwelling to the front from damage while fire attack is in the offensive mode. It is unknown at this time if it is a converted garage. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E75 E91 RA91 T75; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#0593; 10:33AM; 2698 N Commonwealth Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KvgXPk; Griffith Park; LAFD Air Ops located the patient and lowered an aeromedic to assess her. The 43yo female hiker has a non-life threatening lower extremity injury. Due to the location and terrain, a hoist operation will be used to retrieve and then transport the patient. The 9-1-1 call was received at 33AM. No further details.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E35 H4 H5 HA4 HA5 RA35 RA835 RH114 T35; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#0432; 09:53AM; 8038 S Alverstone Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zKqnkJ; Westchester; After an extensive search in the structure with excessive storage conditions, firefighters located the deceased remains of (presumed) adult male. Building type is updated: it is a garage to the rear of a single family dwelling and it has a small, attached occupancy. An adult male was believed to be in the unit and was unaccounted for upon fire extinguishment. Due to the amount of storage, it took a significant amount of overhaul to permit a search of the occupancy. LAFD Arson is responding (per protocol) for the investigation and there are no further details available at this time. ; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E5 E51 E67 RA95 T5; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0432; 08:53AM; 8042 S Alverstone Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nZUKRP; Westchester; KNOCKDOWN: 18 firefighters extinguished the fire in 30 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the garage. Firefighters will be on scene for approximately two hours conducting overhaul due to excessive storage conditions. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E51 E67 RA95 T5; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0432; 08:23AM; 8042 S Alverstone Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nZUKRP; Westchester; Two story duplex with a detached garage to the rear which has fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E51 E67 RA95 T5; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - NOW OUT; INC#0175; 02:59AM; 2602 S Holt Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3mi5uKG; Mid-City; Firefighters arrived to find a one story, single family dwelling (believed to be vacant) with heavy fire showing and one additional building exposed. The incident commander requested additional resources and firefighters initiated an offensive fire attack. 50 firefighters fully extinguished the fire in 25 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters prevented the fire from extending into the exposed building, limiting the damage to windows and the exterior. No injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was received at 2:34AM. No further details.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E226 E261 E292 E294 E34 E58 E68 E94 EM9 RA68 T26 T61 T92 T94; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1456; 08:14PM; 4180 W 4th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3mmBNZ6; Koreatown; KNOCKDOWN: 42 FF extinguished the fire in 33 minutes with no injuries reported. While there were some (number unknown) windows which were damaged on the exposed apartment building, the fire was stopped from extending into the structure. Firefighters will remain on scene for an unknown duration to conduct extensive overhaul operations to ensure no pockets of fire remain. LA Building and Safety are responding. No further details.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E226 E229 E235 E29 E52 E6 EM11 RA29 T26 T29 T35; CH9; 16; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1456; 07:41PM; 4180 W 4th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3mmBNZ6; Koreatown; Two story, single family dwelling (previous burn) well involved with one apartment building (3 story residential over parking) exposed. Two additional task forces requested (reflected in this alert). Firefighters are in the defensive mode.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E226 E229 E235 E29 E52 E6 EM11 RA29 T26 T29 T35; CH9; 16; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#0798; 01:11PM; 3040 Runyon Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KnVsj3; Hollywood Hills West; Firefighters located an approximately 50yo female hiker who sustained a lower extremity injury. Due to the terrain and location, LAFD Air Ops is preparing to conduct a hoist operation and transport. The 9-1-1 call was received at 12:47PM No further details.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E27 E41 H3 H5 HA3 HA5 RA76 RH214 T27 UR27; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart
